title: LCS is Scripted: WAKE UP SHEEPLE!!!!
body:
Just think about it.
Everything is going exactly according to Riot's script™.
TL won the first two games, then threw the next 3 games to C9.
C9 + TSM rivalry™ is maintained.
TL fights to Break the Fourth place Curse™.
TSM, the IEM KIEV World Champions 2015™, will take C9 to 5 games, ending in an Epic Comeback™, securing their place as the best in the NA region.

It's clear that this is more scripted than the UFC.
This is not e-sports™, this is WWE™-esque scripted entertainment.
